```{r}
# NA and Outlier analysis

# installation 
install.packages"daltoolbox")

# loading DAL
library(daltoolbox) 
```

```{r}
# NA removal

iris <- datasets::iris
head(iris)
nrow(iris)
```

```{r}
# introducing a NA to remove

iris.na <- iris
iris.na$Sepal.Length[2] <- NA
head(iris.na)
nrow(iris.na)
```

```{r}
# removing NA tuples

iris.na.omit <- na.omit(iris.na)
head(iris.na.omit)
nrow(iris.na.omit)
```
